trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2" /> objects.
This class cannot be inherited.

When an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2> store is opened, the result is represented by an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection> object.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2>打开存储，结果由<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection>对象。

trans-unit.source: If you are familiar with the unmanaged Cryptographic API constructs, you can think of an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection> as a memory store of <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2> objects.
trans-unit.target: 如果你熟悉的非托管的加密 API 构造，则可以考虑<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection>作为内存存储的<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2>对象。

trans-unit.source: The following code example opens the current user's personal certificate store, selects only valid certificates, allows the user to select a certificate, and then writes certificate and certificate chain information to the console.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例打开当前用户的个人证书存储区，仅选择有效的证书，允许用户选择证书时，然后将证书和证书链信息写入控制台。

trans-unit.source: The output depends on the certificate the user selects.
trans-unit.target: 输出取决于用户选择的证书。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection" /> class.

Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection" /> class without any <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2" /> information.

This constructor creates an empty <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection> object, which is unlike the other constructors that use certificate or collection information to create the object.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数创建一个空<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection>对象，它是与不同的是使用证书或集合的信息来创建对象的其他构造函数。

trans-unit.source: The following code example opens the current user's personal certificate store, selects only valid certificates, allows the user to select a certificate, and then writes certificate and certificate chain information to the console.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例打开当前用户的个人证书存储区，仅选择有效的证书，允许用户选择证书时，然后将证书和证书链信息写入控制台。

trans-unit.source: The output depends on the certificate the user selects.
trans-unit.target: 输出取决于用户选择的证书。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2" /> object to start the collection from.

Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection" /> class using an <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2" /> object.
An array of <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2" /> objects.

Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection" /> class using an array of <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2" /> objects.

The following code example opens the current user's personal certificate store, selects only valid certificates, allows the user to select a certificate, and then writes certificate and certificate chain information to the console.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例打开当前用户的个人证书存储区，仅选择有效的证书，允许用户选择证书时，然后将证书和证书链信息写入控制台。

trans-unit.source: The output depends on the certificate you select.
trans-unit.target: 输出取决于你选择的证书。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection" /> object.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection" /> class using the specified certificate collection.

The following code example opens the current user's personal certificate store, selects only valid certificates, allows the user to select a certificate, and then writes certificate and certificate chain information to the console.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例打开当前用户的个人证书存储区，仅选择有效的证书，允许用户选择证书时，然后将证书和证书链信息写入控制台。

trans-unit.source: The output depends on the certificate the user selects.
trans-unit.target: 输出取决于用户选择的证书。

trans-unit.source: An X.509 certificate represented as an <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2" /> object.
Adds an object to the end of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection" />.
The <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection" /> index at which the <paramref name="certificate" /> has been added.
This method adds an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2> object to a collection and returns the index location of the certificate.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将添加<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2>到集合的对象并返回证书的索引位置。

trans-unit.source: The following code example opens an X.509 certificate store, adds and deletes certificates, and then closes the store.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例打开 X.509 证书存储区，将添加和删除证书，然后关闭该存储区。

trans-unit.source: It assumes that you have three certificates to add to and remove from a local store.
trans-unit.target: 它假定您有三个证书，以将添加到和从本地存储中删除。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="certificate" /> is <see langword="null" />.

Adds multiple <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2" /> objects to an <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection" /> object.
An array of <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2" /> objects.

Adds multiple <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2" /> objects in an array to the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection" /> object.

Use this method if you have an array of <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2> objects to add to an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection> object.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法，如果你有的数组<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2>要添加到对象<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection>对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.AddRange%2A> and <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.RemoveRange%2A> methods process requests transactionally, so that if a single add or remove fails, the entire operation is aborted.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.AddRange%2A>和<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.RemoveRange%2A>方法处理请求事务处理方式，因此，如果单个添加或删除失败，则整个操作中止。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="certificates" /> is <see langword="null" />.
An <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection" /> object.

Adds multiple <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2" /> objects in an <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection" /> object to another <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection" /> object.

Use this method if you have certificates in an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection> object that you want to add to another <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection> object.
trans-unit.target: 如果你有证书使用此方法<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection>你想要添加到另一个对象<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection>对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.AddRange%2A> and <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.RemoveRange%2A> methods process requests transactionally, so that if a single add or remove fails, the entire operation is aborted.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.AddRange%2A>和<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.RemoveRange%2A>方法处理请求事务处理方式，因此，如果单个添加或删除失败，则整个操作中止。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="certificates" /> is <see langword="null" />.
The <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2" /> object to locate in the collection.
Determines whether the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection" /> object contains a specific certificate.

<see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection" /> contains the specified <paramref name="certificate" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
This method performs a linear search; therefore, the average execution time is proportional to the <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 此方法执行的线性搜索;因此，平均执行时间成正比<xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: That is, this method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 也就是说，此方法为 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是<xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A>。

trans-unit.source: This method determines equality by calling the <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 此方法通过调用可确定相等性<xref:System.Object.Equals%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="certificate" /> is <see langword="null" />.
Exports X.509 certificate information based on content type into a byte array.
A supported <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType" /> object.
Exports X.509 certificate information into a byte array.
X.509 certificate information in a byte array.
This method supports content types that do not require a password.
trans-unit.target: 此方法支持不需要密码的内容类型。

trans-unit.source: A supported <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType" /> object.
A string used to protect the byte array.
Exports X.509 certificate information into a byte array using a password.
X.509 certificate information in a byte array.
This method supports the following <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> types:
trans-unit.target: 此方法支持下列<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>类型：

trans-unit.source: The certificate is unreadable, the content is invalid or, in the case of a certificate requiring a password, the private key could not be exported because the password provided was incorrect.
One of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509FindType" /> values.
The search criteria as an object.
<see langword="true" /> to allow only valid certificates to be returned from the search; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.

Searches an <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection" /> object using the search criteria specified by the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509FindType" /> enumeration and the <paramref name="findValue" /> object.
An <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection" /> object.
Use this method to find <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2> objects if no user interaction is needed.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法查找<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2>对象如果需要无用户干预。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.Find%2A> method to allow the user to select <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2> objects.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.Find%2A>方法以允许用户选择<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2>对象。

trans-unit.source: Note that this method can be used in a cascading or nested style, narrowing the search criteria with each call to the method.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，此方法可以使用级联或嵌套样式，收缩搜索条件，并且每次调用方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example opens the current user's personal certificate store, finds only valid certificates, allows the user to select a certificate, and then writes certificate and certificate chain information to the console.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例打开当前用户的个人证书存储区，仅查找有效证书，允许用户选择证书时，然后将证书和证书链信息写入控制台。

trans-unit.source: The output depends on the certificate the user selects.
trans-unit.target: 输出取决于用户选择的证书。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="findType" /> is invalid.
Returns an enumerator that can iterate through a <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection" /> object.

An <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Enumerator" /> object that can iterate through the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection" /> object.
Enumerators allow read-only access to data in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 枚举器集合中允许只读访问数据。

trans-unit.source: Enumerators cannot be used to modify the underlying collection.
trans-unit.target: 枚举器不能用于修改基础集合。

trans-unit.source: Imports a certificate into a <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection" /> object.
A byte array containing data from an X.509 certificate.
Imports a certificate in the form of a byte array into a <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection" /> object.
This method imports a certificate in the form of a byte array into a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection> object.
trans-unit.target: 此方法导入到字节数组形式的证书<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection>对象。

trans-unit.source: This method supports the following <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> types:
trans-unit.target: 此方法支持下列<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>类型：

trans-unit.source: The name of the file containing the certificate information.
Imports a certificate file into a <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection" /> object.
This method supports the following <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> types:
trans-unit.target: 此方法支持下列<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>类型：

trans-unit.source: A byte array containing data from an <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2" /> object.
The password required to access the certificate information.
A bitwise combination of the enumeration values that control how and where the certificate is imported.

Imports a certificate, in the form of a byte array that requires a password to access the certificate, into a <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection" /> object.
This method can be used with a PFX/PKCS12 binary large object (BLOB) protected by a password.
trans-unit.target: 此方法可以用于 PFX/PKCS12 二进制大型对象 (BLOB) 受密码保护。

trans-unit.source: Key containers associated with certificates in the PFX/PKCS12 BLOB can be created and the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509KeyStorageFlags> value can be used to control this process.
trans-unit.target: 可以创建与 PFX/PKCS12 BLOB 中的证书相关联的密钥容器和<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509KeyStorageFlags>值可以用于控制此进程。

trans-unit.source: Note that if you do not create a key container, the private key is not persisted.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，是否不创建的密钥容器，不永久性的私钥。

trans-unit.source: This method imports a certificate byte array into a collection of certificates.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将证书字节数组导入证书的集合。

trans-unit.source: This method supports the following <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> types:
trans-unit.target: 此方法支持下列<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>类型：

trans-unit.source: The name of the file containing the certificate information.
The password required to access the certificate information.
A bitwise combination of the enumeration values that control how and where the certificate is imported.
Imports a certificate file that requires a password into a <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection" /> object.
This method can be used with a PFX/PKCS12 file or other certificate files that require a password.
trans-unit.target: 此方法可以用于 PFX/PKCS12 文件或其他证书文件，需要密码。

trans-unit.source: Key containers associated with certificates in the PFX/PKCS12 file can be created and <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509KeyStorageFlags> value can be used to control this process.
trans-unit.target: 可以创建与 PFX/PKCS12 文件中的证书相关联的密钥容器和<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509KeyStorageFlags>值可以用于控制此进程。

trans-unit.source: Note that if you do not create a key container, the private key is not persisted.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，是否不创建的密钥容器，不永久性的私钥。

trans-unit.source: Note that a PFX/PKCS12 file can contain more than one certificate.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，PFX/PKCS12 文件可以包含多个证书。

trans-unit.source: This method imports the first certificate associated with the private key or, if no private key is found, the first certificate found.
trans-unit.target: 此方法导入私钥与关联的第一个证书或找到没有私钥，找到的第一个证书。

trans-unit.source: This method supports the following <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> types:
trans-unit.target: 此方法支持下列<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>类型：

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index at which to insert <c>certificate</c>.
The <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2" /> object to insert.
Inserts an object into the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection" /> object at the specified index.

If the <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A> property already equals the capacity of the list, the capacity is doubled by automatically reallocating the internal array before the new element is inserted.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A>属性已经等于列表的容量，容量翻倍通过自动重新分配在内部数组，才能插入新元素。

trans-unit.source: If `index` is equal to <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A>, `certificate` is added to the end of the collection.
trans-unit.target: 如果`index`等同于<xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A>，`certificate`添加到集合的末尾。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> is less than zero.
-or-
<paramref name="index" /> is greater than the <see cref="P:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count" /> property.
The collection is read-only.
-or-
The collection has a fixed size.
<paramref name="certificate" /> is <see langword="null" />.
The zero-based index of the element to get or set.
Gets or sets the element at the specified index.
The element at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 指定索引处的元素。

trans-unit.source: This property provides the ability to access a specific element in the collection by using the following syntax: `myCollection[index]`.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用下面的语法通过此属性访问集合中的特定元素：`myCollection[index]`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example opens the current user's personal certificate store, selects only valid certificates, allows the user to select a certificate, and then writes certificate and certificate chain information to the console.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例打开当前用户的个人证书存储区，仅选择有效的证书，允许用户选择证书时，然后将证书和证书链信息写入控制台。

trans-unit.source: The output depends on the certificate the user selects.
trans-unit.target: 输出取决于用户选择的证书。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> is less than zero.
-or-
<paramref name="index" /> is equal to or greater than the <see cref="P:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count" /> property.
<paramref name="index" /> is <see langword="null" />.

The <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2" /> object to be removed from the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection" /> object.
Removes the first occurrence of a certificate from the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection" /> object.
This method removes the first occurrence of a certificate.
trans-unit.target: 此方法移除证书的第一个匹配项。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="certificate" /> is <see langword="null" />.

Removes multiple <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2" /> objects from an <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection" /> object.
An array of <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2" /> objects.

Removes multiple <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2" /> objects in an array from an <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection" /> object.

Use this method if you have an array of <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2> objects to remove from an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection> object.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法，如果你有的数组<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2>对象以删除从<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection>对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.AddRange%2A> and <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.RemoveRange%2A> methods process requests transactionally, so that if a single add or remove fails, the entire operation is aborted.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.AddRange%2A>和<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.RemoveRange%2A>方法处理请求事务处理方式，因此，如果单个添加或删除失败，则整个操作中止。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="certificates" /> is <see langword="null" />.
An <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection" /> object.

Removes multiple <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2" /> objects in an <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection" /> object from another <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection" /> object.

Use this method if you have certificates in an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection> object that you want to remove from another <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection> object.
trans-unit.target: 如果你有证书使用此方法<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection>你想要从另一个删除的对象<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection>对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.AddRange%2A> and <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.RemoveRange%2A> methods process requests transactionally, so that if a single add or remove fails, the entire operation is aborted.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.AddRange%2A>和<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.RemoveRange%2A>方法处理请求事务处理方式，因此，如果单个添加或删除失败，则整个操作中止。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="certificates" /> is <see langword="null" />.
